name: Pork Ribs and Lotus Root Soup
author: tonytsang
summary: A simple yet delicious Chinese soup. This dish takes a little time to cook, but the results are really worth it. Pork spare ribs are simmered with scallops and lotus roots.
ingredients: 1 pound pork spare ribs, cut into 1-inch pieces
3  lotus roots, peeled and cut into 1/3-inch slices
directions: Place dried scallops in a small bowl and cover with water
Let soak until softened, 30 minutes to 1 hour
Drain and cut into small pieces
Bring a large pot of water to a boil
Add pork spare ribs; cook for 5 to 8 minutes
Drain and rinse under cold water
Combine scallops, spare ribs, and lotus roots in a pot
Add three times the volume of water; bring to a boil
Cook at a boil for 30 minutes
Reduce heat to medium and simmer, adding more water if needed, until lotus roots are soft and water is reduced by a third, 2 to 3 hours
